CmdLine: apt-get -qq update &&     apt-get -qq install         apt-utils         python-software-properties         software-properties-common     &&     add-apt-repository -y ppa:george-edison55/cmake-3.x &&     add-apt-repository -y ppa:ubuntu-toolchain-r/test &&     apt-get -qq update &&     apt-get -qq install         clang-3.9         cmake         g++-5         gcc-5         libsdl2-dev         libsdl2-image-dev     &&     update-alternatives --install /usr/bin/gcc gcc /usr/bin/gcc-5 1000 &&     update-alternatives --install /usr/bin/g++ g++ /usr/bin/g++-5 1000 &&     update-alternatives --install /usr/bin/clang clang /usr/bin/clang-3.9 1000 &&     update-alternatives --install /usr/bin/clang++ clang++ /usr/bin/clang++-3.9 1000
Commands.Name: run
